short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create groups that are listed vertically in Trello

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trello limits its view to an infinitely horizontally scrolling web page that limits how much information is displayed on your screen. This extension allows you to create groups to organize your lists and scroll vertically as well as horizontally.

* To create a new group, add the | character to the header of any list. This will create a new group below it. 
* Any text after the "|" character will be the group name
* Long titles will cause strange formatting of the lists, but otherwise will not break anything. I recommend limiting them to approximately 20 characters

All existing functionality, such as creating new lists, dragging to rearrange them, or moving cards between lists, is preserved.
